title: My account suspended permanently?
body:
I didn't play LoL in these days, the last game I played was on Wednesday.
I just got a LeaverBuster and got a low priority queue, I think it's the computer system problem, but  I still sent a ticket to Riot Games(like this one) to ask you to cancel the leaverbuster.
Before I received the feedback, I finished the low priority queue by myself, my last 5 games had a leaverbuster. You can check my match history in OP.GG. My name "Inmessionante"
As you can see, after afk in a normal game as Tristana (It was a remake game), I played 5 aram game to take the leaverbuster, I've just finished it.
The reply of my ticket was about how to fix the problem(the problem that made me stuck in the loading screen and disconnected and afk), not about cancel the leaverbuster or my behaviour.
But today when I want to login in and have a look about the Worlds mission, I just discovered that my account is suspended.
Now I have some questions to ask.
1. Is suspended same as banned? (Is it becasue you are doing some fixing on my account, or I got banned?
2. When will it finish?
3. What's the reason?
I promise I didn't have any negative attitudes apart from afk, and I told you the reason, I didn't suppose to do that.

I suppose to post the text above by support ticket, but it showed that my CAPTCHA failed, I don't know why that happened. So I post here.

AND NOW I know it is a permanently banned. WHY???{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Submit another ticket to support, they'll be able to tell you the reason for the punishment. It's possible your account has been compromised from the sounds of your post, but only support can tell you.

Yeah I tried, but it showed "The CAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again." 
What should I do?
It means either there's something up with your connection, or you've typed in the verification code wrong/not ticked the captcha box. Just try again.

Based on the information you've provided, I'd be inclined to go with Seras and say it's possibly a response to compromise, in which case going through the account recovery process should sort you out properly. Regarding the issue you've encountered with the captcha, you could try using alternate browsers (just tested it on my end, worked for me on Google Chrome and Firefox, but Internet Explorer doesn't seem to like the "submit a request" page). You should have received an email to the registered address regarding the ban, that might have some more info on why it's happened, so I'd recommend checking for that.

Given we're talking about a possible compromise, I'd also recommend you do a scan using some anti-virus software (Malwarebytes Antimalware is a good free option [in my experience], if you need it), just in case. Checking your match history for games you didn't play yourself could help identify if there was a compromise. If you find anything suspicious (particularly from an antivirus scan), it would probably be a good idea to go through and change some of your log-in details for things you've used recently (emails, online banking and such in particular).

Just as a note regarding the LeaverBuster side of things, it's a policy that Riot will never remove Low Priority Queues. LeaverBuster typically doesn't result in suspensions, either. You can find more info regarding the LeaverBuster system in the LeaverBuster FAQ (Link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714).
